name: cave
summary: Trapped in a dark cave, a young adventurer tries to escape a rather dark fate. On your journey, you will need to dig your way out to freedom. On your path you will collect rare materials, smelt them and craft custom weapons and tools that will help you to escape that hell hole!

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: I built my first crafting game in Godot engine! | cave devlog #1
